data.question: What is the chemical formula of TPB-1?
Which TPB crystal has the highest quantum yield according to the study?
Is TPCH less oxidized than TPB?
What is the role of H3PO4 in the synthesis of TPB crystals?
data.answer: It assists the reduction of NO3- to NH4+.

data.question: Can TPB-2 transform into TPB-1 upon gentle heating?
What is the space group of NTHU-12?
What happens to the photoluminescence color of TPB-2 when it is gently heated?
Does the synthesis of TPB-1 require organic solvents?
What type of ligand is TPB considered in the context of metal phosphates?
Are TPB-2 and TPB-3 both dihydrate crystals?
What is the role of nitrate ions in the synthesis of TPB crystals?
Is the framework of NTHU-12 positively charged?
What is the emission wavelength range of TPCH?
Can TPB-3 be transformed back into TPB-1?
What is the significance of the synthesis method used for TPB and TPCH?
data.answer: It does not require organic solvents or catalysts.

data.question: Does TPB-1 have any hydrogen bonding in its structure?
What is the crystal system of TPB-2?
What transformation occurs to TPB-2 and TPB-3 upon gentle heating?
Is the molecular formula of TPCH confirmed by FAB-MASS analysis?
What unique feature does NTHU-12 exhibit under UV light excitation?
data.answer: It shows near-white light from triple-wavelength emissions.
